Class Preference_Email

java.lang.Object
  Preference
      com.mk4droid.IMC_Core.Preference_Email

public class Preference_Email
extends Preference

Create a custom preference in Setup with the role of a button that leads to a new activity, that is sending a mail with an outside application, e.g. gmail.
